title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi
fullTitle: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2019)

episodes.title: 70. Bölüm
episodes.plot: Behzat throws caution aside as he hunts for those linked to the murder of a loved one. Surveillance footage captures a face that may be the killer's.

episodes.title: 71. Bölüm
episodes.plot: After learning that Gökhan has a record, Behzat digs deeper to find out who pulled strings to place the ex-con as a courthouse security guard.

episodes.title: Kesisme
episodes.plot: While working undercover at the bar with Eylül, Behzat unexpectedly crosses paths with Ercüment. Vulture gives his statement about the shooting.

episodes.title: Son Düzlük
episodes.plot: On his way to meet with Behzat, Esra's ex-husband encounters foul play. Ercüment gives the former undersecretary's wife a test of loyalty.

episodes.title: Öteki... Bizden Olmayan...
episodes.plot: When the body of a teen girl is found at a construction site, the team learns she and her little brother had disappeared from home during the night.

episodes.title: Sakli Öfke
episodes.plot: Behzat and his team investigate the murder of a man who abused street children, unaware that the killers are people they're working closely with.

episodes.title: Bebek Gibi
episodes.plot: Behzat has a disturbing reaction upon seeing a pregnant murder victim. Sevket views surveillance footage of his mother's last night in the hospital.

episodes.title: Gözler Kör Kulaklar Sagir
episodes.plot: A nanny's odd reaction during an interrogation leads Behzat to the motive for the murder of a grandfather. Sevket learns the truth about his mother.

episodes.title: Evde
episodes.plot: Behzat gathers his team members at Vulture's house for a long, cathartic night of drinking anisette, airing grievances and revealing secrets.

episodes.title: Saatler
episodes.plot: The murder of a retired counter-terrorism chief with a reputation for making false arrests reminds Behzat of his own part in an innocent man's death.

episodes.title: 80. Bölüm
episodes.plot: A student activist is fatally stabbed following a scuffle at a petition-signing event. Ghost makes progress in his investigation of Eylül.

episodes.title: Arsiv
episodes.plot: En route to meet Ghost, who's phoned to say he has Eylül, Behzat revisits defining moments from his past and tries to make sense of his present life.

episodes.title: Degerli Ceset
episodes.plot: Before performing an autopsy on a murder victim found in a park, Barbaros is ordered by a mobster to hand over an item inside the body's stomach.

episodes.title: Yanilgi
episodes.plot: When an eminent physicist getting a passport at the police station is poisoned by injection, Behzat orders all exits blocked and hunts for the killer.

episodes.title: Saplanti
episodes.plot: Homicide team members are shocked to learn the prime suspect in their new case is one of their relatives. Cevdet is forced to make a terrible choice.

episodes.title: Evlat Sevgisi
episodes.plot: The investigation of a 16-year-old girl's murder reveals the teenager was bullied at school and beaten at home. Eylül receives a lucrative offer.

episodes.title: Kapanmayan Hesap
episodes.plot: The stolen diamonds put Barbaros and Muzaffer in danger. Eylül discovers the offer she accepted comes with rewards, but also complications.

episodes.title: Senaristin Ölümü
episodes.plot: While investigating the murder of a screenwriter, Behzat and his team are pulled behind the scenes of a television drama series.

episodes.title: Karisik Zamanlar
episodes.plot: When a private investigator is found strangled with a dog leash, Behzat learns he was trying to find a stolen dog that was to appear in a commercial.

episodes.title: Dava
episodes.plot: After an attempt is made to kill Gökhan in prison, Harun and Eda are sent to Bolu to find his hiding family members, who are also in danger.

episodes.title: Adalet
episodes.plot: The trial for the assassination case finally begins and Gökhan takes the stand. Meanwhile, Barbaros and Muzaffer seek their own form of justice.

episodes.title: Egitim Zayiati
episodes.plot: The body of a 22-year-old man who'd recently completed his military service is found in a dumpster. Ayse identifies the photographer she saw.

episodes.title: Orantisiz Güçlüler
episodes.plot: When a student dies of a cerebral hemorrhage after a university protest, the team must determine whether force used by security officers caused it.

episodes.title: 93. Bölüm
episodes.plot: Shortly after a young man's body is found with surgical-like incisions on his torso, a second victim with the same type of cuts is discovered.

episodes.title: Yüksek Gerilim
episodes.plot: Behzat discovers a cover-up behind the murder of a pizza delivery man, and accidentally interrupts Barbaros and Muzaffer as they are exacting revenge.

episodes.title: Dönüm Noktasi
episodes.plot: Certain Muzaffer didn't act alone, Behzat has Barbaros followed. Sule spies Emre in a shocking meeting. Gökhan reveals who arranged the assassination.

episodes.title: Son Hesaplasma
episodes.plot: Barbaros and Muzaffer settle a final score. With solid proof in hand, Emre plans to make a capture. Those behind the assassination must pay.
